standard_metadata.standard_description: Recognize that in a multi-digit number, a digit in one place represents 10 times as much as it represents in the place to its right and 1/10 of what it represents in the place to its left.

question.content: **Which statement correctly compares the values of the $5$s in $634{,}9\maroonE{5}2$ and $43{,}\blueE{5}97$?**

hints.content: ### What is the place value of each $5$?  Hundred thousands | Ten thousands |Thousands | $\blueE{\text{Hundreds}}$ | $\maroonE{\text{Tens}}$ | Ones :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: $6$ | $3$ |$4$ | $9$ | $\maroonE5$| $2$  | $4$ |$3$ | $\blueE5$ | $9$| $7$  The $\maroonE{5}$ in $634{,}9\maroonE{5}2$ represents $\maroonE{5 \text{ tens}}$.  The $\blueE{5}$ in $43{,}\blueE{5}97$ represents $\blueE{5 \text{ hundreds}}$.
### How much bigger or smaller is $\maroonE{5 \text{ tens}}$ than $\blueE{5 \text{ hundreds}}$?  $\maroonE{50} = {\large?} \times \blueE{500}$
$\maroonE{50} = \dfrac{1}{10} \times \blueE{500}$
### The answer  $\maroonE{50}$ is $\dfrac{1}{10}$ times the value of $\blueE{500}$.

question.content: **Which statement correctly compares the values of the $2$s in $43{,}\maroonE{2}90$ and $3\blueE{2}{,}865$?**

hints.content: ### What is the place value of each $2$?  Ten thousands |$\blueE{\text{Thousands}}$ | $\maroonE{\text{Hundreds}}$ | Tens | Ones :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: $4$ | $3$ |$\maroonE2$ |  $9$| $0$ $3$ |$\blueD2$ | $8$ | $6$| $5$  The $\maroonE{2}$ in $43{,}\maroonE290$ represents $\maroonE{2 \text{ hundreds}}$.  The $\blueE{2}$ in $3\blueE2{,}865$ represents $\blueE{2 \text{ thousands}}$.
### How much bigger or smaller is $\maroonE{2 \text{ hundreds}}$ than $\blueE{2 \text{ thousands}}$?  $\maroonE{200} = {\large?} \times \blueE{2{,}000}$
$\maroonE{200} = \dfrac{1}{10} \times \blueE{2{,}000}$
### The answer  $\maroonE{200}$ is $\dfrac{1}{10}$ times the value of $\blueE{2{,}000}$.

question.content: **Which statement correctly compares the values of the $9$s in $13{.}\maroonE{9}8$ and $55\blueE{9}{.}7$?**

hints.content: ### What is the place value of each $9$?  Hundreds | Tens | $\blueE{\text{Ones}}$ |. | $\maroonE{\text{Tenths}}$ | Hundredths  :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | $1$ |$3$ | . |$\maroonE9$| $8$ $5$ | $5$ | $\blueE9$ |. | $7$|   The $\maroonE{9}$ in $13.\maroonE98$ represents $\maroonE{9 \text{ tenths}}$.  The $\blueE{9}$ in $55\blueE9.7$ represents $\blueE{9 \text{ ones}}$.
### How much bigger or smaller is $\maroonE{9 \text{ tenths}}$ than $\blueE{9 \text{ ones}}$?  $\maroonE{0.9} ={\large?} \times \blueE{9}$
$\maroonE{0.9} = \dfrac{1}{10} \times \blueE{9}$
### The answer  $\maroonE{0.9}$ is $\dfrac{1}{10}$ times the value of $\blueE{9}$.

question.content: **Which statement correctly compares the values of the $7$s in $14{.}83\maroonE{7}$ and $2{.}2\blueE{7}$?**

hints.content: ### What is the place value of each $7$?  Tens | Ones |. | Tenths | $\blueE{\text{Hundredths}}$ | $\maroonE{\text{Thousandths}}$  :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: $1$ |$4$ | . |$8$| $3$ | $\maroonE7$ | $2$ | . | $2$ |$\blueE7$ |  The $\maroonE{7}$ in $14.83\maroonE7$ represents $\maroonE{7 \text{ thousandths}}$.  The $\blueE{7}$ in $2.2\blueE7$ represents $\blueE{7 \text{ hundredths}}$.
### How much bigger or smaller is $\maroonE{7 \text{ thousandths}}$ than $\blueE{7 \text{ hundredths}}$?  $\maroonE{0.007} = {\large?} \times \blueE{0.07}$
$\maroonE{0.007} = \dfrac{1}{10} \times \blueE{0.07}$
### The answer  $\maroonE{0.007}$ is $\dfrac{1}{10}$  times the value of $\blueE{0.07}$.

question.content: **Which statement correctly compares the values of the $3$s in $6{.}8\maroonE{3}2$ and $112{.}\blueE{3}$?**

hints.content: ### What is the place value of each $3$?  Hundreds | Tens | Ones|. | $\blueE{\text{Tenths}}$ | $\maroonE{\text{Hundredths}}$ | Thousandths :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  |  |$6$ | . |$8$ | $\maroonE3$ | $2$ $1$ | $1$ | $2$ |. | $\blueE3$||   The $\maroonE{3}$ in $6.8\maroonE32$ represents $\maroonE{3 \text{ hundredths}}$.  The $\blueE{3}$ in $112.\blueE3$ represents $\blueE{3 \text{ tenths}}$.
### How much bigger or smaller is $\maroonE{3\text{ hundredths}}$ than $\blueE{3 \text{ tenths}}$?   $\maroonE{0.03} = {\large?} \times \blueE{0.3}$
$\maroonE{0.03} = \dfrac{1}{10} \times \blueE{0.3}$
### The answer  $\maroonE{0.03}$ is $\dfrac{1}{10}$ times the value of $\blueE{0.3}$.

question.content: **Which statement correctly compares the values of the $1$s in $\maroonE1{,}255$ and $82{,}\blueE{1}75$?**

hints.content: ### What is the place value of each $1$?  Ten thousands |$\maroonE{\text{Thousands}}$ | $\blueE{\text{Hundreds}}$ | Tens | Ones :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | $\maroonE1$ |$2$ | $5$ | $5$ $8$ | $2$ | $\blueE1$ | $7$ | $5$  The $\maroonE{1}$ in $\maroonE1{,}255$ represents $\maroonE{1 \text{ thousand}}$.  The $\blueE{1}$ in $82{,}\blueE175$ represents $\blueE{1 \text{ hundred}}$.
### How much bigger or smaller is $\maroonE{1 \text{ thousand}}$ than $\blueE{1 \text{ hundred}}$?  $\maroonE{1{,}000} = {\large?} \times \blueE{100}$
$\maroonE{1{,}000} = {10} \times \blueE{100}$
### The answer  $\maroonE{1{,}000}$ is ${10}$ times the value of $\blueE{100}$.

question.content: **Which statement correctly compares the values of the $8$s in $2{,}7\maroonE{8}1$ and $94\blueE{8}$?**

hints.content: ### What is the place value of each $8$?  Thousands | Hundreds | $\maroonE{\text{Tens}}$ | $\blueE{\text{Ones}}$ :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: $2$ | $7$ | $\maroonE8$| $1$  | $9$ |$4$ | $\blueE8$  The $\maroonE{8}$ in $2{,}7\maroonE81$ represents $\maroonE{8 \text{ tens}}$.  The $\blueE{8}$ in $94\blueE8$ represents $\blueE{8 \text{ ones}}$.
### How much bigger or smaller is $\maroonE{8 \text{ tens}}$ than $\blueE{8 \text{ ones}}$?  $\maroonE{80} = {\large?} \times \blueE{8}$
$\maroonE{80} = {10} \times \blueE{8}$
### The answer  $\maroonE{80}$ is ${10}$ times the value of $\blueE{8}$.

question.content: **Which statement correctly compares the values of the $7$s in $\maroonE{7}.825$ and $3.\blueE{7}$?**

hints.content: ### What is the place value of each $7$?   $\maroonE{\text{Ones}}$ | . | $\blueE{\text{Tenths}}$ | Hundredths | Thousandths :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: $\maroonE7$ | . |$8$ | $2$ | $5$  $3$ |. | $\blueE7$ | |   The $\maroonE{7}$ in $\maroonE7.825$ represents $\maroonE{7 \text{ ones}}$.  The $\blueE{7}$ in $3.\blueE7$ represents $\blueE{7 \text{ tenths}}$.
### How much bigger or smaller is $\maroonE{7 \text{ ones}}$ than $\blueE{7 \text{ tenths}}$?  $\maroonE{7} = {\large?} \times \blueE{0.7}$
$\maroonE{7} = {10} \times \blueE{0.7}$
### The answer  $\maroonE{7}$ is ${10}$ times the value of $\blueE{0.7}$.

question.content: **Which statement correctly compares the values of the $6$s in $4.\maroonE{6}01$ and $95.9\blueE{6}$?**

hints.content: ### What is the place value of each $6$?  Tens | Ones|. | $\maroonE{\text{Tenths}}$ | $\blueE{\text{Hundredths}}$ | Thousandths :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  |$4$ | . |$\maroonE6$ | $0$ | $1$  $9$ | $5$ |. | $9$ | $\blueE6$ |    The $\maroonE{6}$ in $4.\maroonE601$ represents $\maroonE{6 \text{ tenths}}$.  The $\blueE{6}$ in $95.9\blueE6$ represents $\blueE{6 \text{ hundredths}}$.
### How much bigger or smaller is $\maroonE{6\text{ tenths}}$ than $\blueE{6\text{ hundredths}}$?  $\maroonE{0.6} = {\large?} \times \blueE{0.06}$
$\maroonE{0.6} = {10} \times \blueE{0.06}$
### The answer  $\maroonE{0.6}$ is $10$ times the value of $\blueE{0.06}$.

question.content: **Which statement correctly compares the values of the $3$s in $46.1\maroonE{3}2$ and $8.55\blueE{3}$?**

hints.content: ### What is the place value of each $3$?  Tens | Ones|. | Tenths | $\maroonE{\text{Hundredths}}$ | $\blueE{\text{Thousandths}}$ :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  $4$ |$6$ | . |$1$ | $\maroonE3$ | $2$  | $8$ | .| $5$ | $5$ | $\blueE3$   The $\maroonE{3}$ in $46.1\maroonE32$ represents $\maroonE{3 \text{ hundredths}}$.  The $\blueE{3}$ in $8.55\blueE3$ represents $\blueE{3 \text{ thousandths}}$.
### How much bigger or smaller is $\maroonE{3 \text{ hundredths}}$ than $\blueE{3 \text{ thousandths}}$?  $\maroonE{0.03} = {\large?} \times \blueE{0.003}$
$\maroonE{0.03} = {10} \times \blueE{0.003}$
### The answer  $\maroonE{0.03}$ is $10$ times the value of $\blueE{0.003}$.

question.content: **In which number does the digit $2$ have a value that is $\dfrac{1}{10}$ times as great as the digit $2$ in the number $6{,}257.11$?**

hints.content: ##What is the value of the $2$ in $6{,}\blueD{2}57.11$ ?  Thousands | $\blueD{\text{Hundreds}}$ | Tens | Ones | $.$ | Tenths  | Hundredths :-:|:-:|:-:|:-:|:-: | :-: | :-:  $6$ | $\blueD{2}$ | $5$ | $7$ | $.$ | $1$ | $1$  The value of the $2$ in $6{,}\blueD{2}57.11$ is $\blueD{2\text{ hundreds}}$ or $\blueD{200}$.

##What is $\dfrac{1}{10}$ times as great as $2$ hundreds?  A digit in a place value column to the *right* is $\dfrac{1}{10}$ times as much as the same digit to the *left*.  Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones | $.$ | Tenths :-:|:-:|:-:|:-:|:-: | :-: | :-:   | $2$ | $0$ | $0$ ||  |  $\rightarrow$| | || || $2$ | $0$ | $.$ | $0$   $\dfrac{1}{10} \times 200 = \maroonD{20}$

##Which number has a $2$ with a value of $\maroonD{20}$ ?  Thousands | Hundreds | $\maroonD{\text{Tens}}$ | Ones | $.$ | Tenths | Hundredths  :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: $7$ | $3$ | $\maroonD{2}$ | $6$ | $.$ | $6$ | $4$ |  $5$ | $6$ | $1$ | $9$ | $.$ |  $\goldE{2}$ | $5$ |   | $\purpleD{2}$ | $9$ | $1$ | $.$ |  $9$ | $3$ |  $\tealE{2}$ | $5$ | $7$ | $5$ |  | |   The value of the $2$ in the number $7{,}3\maroonD{2}6.64$ is $\maroonD{2\text{ tens}}$ or $\maroonD{20}$.
The value of the $2$ in the number $7{,}3\maroonD{2}6.64$ is $\dfrac{1}{10}$ times the value of the $2$ in the number $6{,}\blueD{2}57.11$.

question.content: **In which number does the digit $4$ have a value that is $\dfrac{1}{10}$ times as great as the digit $4$ in the number $3.846$?**

hints.content: ##What is the value of the $4$ in $3.8\blueD{4}6$ ?   Ones | $.$ | Tenths  | $\blueD{\text{Hundredths}}$ | Thousandths :-:|:-:|:-:|:-:|:-: | :-: | :-:   $3$ | $.$ | $8$ | $\blueD{4}$ | $6$  The value of the $4$ in $3.8\blueD{4}6$ is $\blueD{4\text{ hundredths}}$ or $\blueD{0.04}$.

##What is $\dfrac{1}{10}$ times as great as $4$ hundredths?  A digit in a place value column to the *right* is $\dfrac{1}{10}$ times as much as the same digit to the *left*.  Ones | $.$ | Tenths | Hundredths | Thousandths :-:|:-:|:-:|:-:|:-: | :-: | :-:  $0$ | $.$ | $0$ | $4$ | |||$\rightarrow$|  $0$ | $.$ | $0$ | $0$ | $4$  $\dfrac{1}{10} \times 0.04 = \maroonD{0.004}$

##Which number has a $4$ with a value of $\maroonD{0.004}$ ?  Tens | Ones | $.$ | Tenths | Hundredths | $\maroonD{\text{Thousandths}}$ :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: $2$ | $\goldE{4}$ | $.$ | $0$ | $6$ | $2$ | $0$ | $.$ | $\greenE{4}$ | $0$ | $5$ | $0$ | $.$ | $1$ | $0$ | $\maroonD{4}$ | $2$ | $.$ | $9$ | $\purpleD{4}$ | $6$  The value of the $4$ in the number $0.10\maroonD{4}$ is $\maroonD{4\text{ thousandths}}$ or $\maroonD{0.004}$.
The value of the $4$ in the number $0.10\maroonD{4}$ is $\dfrac{1}{10}$ times the value of the $4$ in the number $3.8\blueD{4}6$.

question.content: **In which number does the digit $8$ have a value that is $\dfrac{1}{10}$ times as great as the digit $8$ in the number $2{,}980.7$?**

hints.content: ##What is the value of the $8$ in $2{,}9\blueD{8}0.7$ ?  Thousands | Hundreds | $\blueD{\text{Tens}}$ | Ones | $.$ | Tenths  :-:|:-:|:-:|:-:|:-: | :-: | :-:  $2$ | $9$ | $\blueD{8}$ | $0$ | $.$ | $7$  The value of the $8$ in $2{,}9\blueD{8}0.7$ is $\blueD{8\text{ tens}}$ or $\blueD{80}$.

##What is $\dfrac{1}{10}$ times as great as $8$ tens?  A digit in a place value column to the *right* is $\dfrac{1}{10}$ times as much as the same digit to the *left*.  Tens | Ones | $.$ | Tenths  :-:|:-:|:-:|:-:|:-: | :-: | :-:  $8$ | $0$ |  |  $\rightarrow$| | |  | $8$ | $.$ | $0$  $\dfrac{1}{10} \times 80 = \maroonD{8}$

##Which number has a $8$ with a value of $\maroonD{8}$ ?  Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | $\maroonD{\text{Ones}}$ | $.$ | Tenths :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | $3$ | $\greenE{8}$ | $9$ | $.$ | $3$  $3$ | $0$ | $2$ | $3$ | $.$ | $\purpleD{8}$  $\goldE{8}$ | $6$ | $5$ | $9$ |  |   | $5$ | $4$ | $\maroonD{8}$ |  |  The value of the $8$ in the number $54\maroonD{8}$ is $\maroonD{8\text{ ones}}$ or $\maroonD{8}$.
The value of the $8$ in the number $54\maroonD{8}$ is $\dfrac{1}{10}$ times the value of the $8$ in the number $2{,}9\blueD{8}0.7$.

question.content: **In which number does the digit $5$ have a value that is $10$ times as great as the digit $5$ in the number $4.59$?**

hints.content: ##What is the value of the $5$ in $4.\blueD{5}9$ ?  Tens | Ones | $.$ | $\blueD{\text{Tenths}}$  | Hundredths :-:|:-:|:-: | :-: | :-:   | $4$ | $.$ | $\blueD{5}$ | $9$  The value of the $5$ in $4.\blueD{5}9$ is $\blueD{5\text{ tenths}}$ or $\blueD{0.5}$.

##What is $10$ times as great as $5$ tenths?  A digit in a place value column to the *left* is $10$ times as much as the same digit to the *right*.  Tens | Ones | $.$ | Tenths  :-:|:-:|:-: | :-:  | $0$ | $.$ | $5$  |  | $.$| $\leftarrow$  | $5$ ||   $10 \times 0.5 = \maroonD{5}$

##Which number has a $5$ with a value of $\maroonD{5}$ ?  Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | $\maroonD{\text{Ones}}$ | $.$ | Tenths | Hundredths  :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: |$\goldE{5}$ | $7$ | $8$||| |$1$ | $3$ | $4$ | $.$ | $\greenE{5}$ | $9$  $2$ | $7$ | $7$ | $\maroonD{5}$ | $.$ | $9$| ||$3$ | $1$ | $.$ | $7$ | $\purpleD{5}$   The value of the $5$ in the number $2{,}77\maroonD{5}.9$ is $\maroonD{5\text{ ones}}$ or $\maroonD{5}$.
The value of the $5$ in the number $2{,}7\maroonD{5}7.9$ is $10$ times the value of the $5$ in the number $4.\blueD{5}9$.

question.content: **In which number does the digit $7$ have a value that is $10$ times as great as the digit $7$ in the number $0.975$?**

hints.content: ##What is the value of the $7$ in $0.9\blueD{7}5$ ?  Ones | $.$ | Tenths  | $\blueD{\text{Hundredths}}$ | Thousandths :-:|:-:|:-: | :-: | :-:  $0$ | $.$ | $9$ | $\blueD{7}$ | $5$  The value of the $7$ in $0.9\blueD{7}5$ is $\blueD{7\text{ hundredths}}$ or $\blueD{0.07}$.

##What is $10$ times as great as $7$ hundredths?  A digit in a place value column to the *left* is $10$ times as much as the same digit to the *right*.  Ones | $.$ | Tenths | Hundredths :-:|:-:|:-: | :-: $0$ | $.$ | $0$ | $7$   |  | | $\leftarrow$  $0$ | $.$ | $7$ |    $10 \times 0.07 = \maroonD{0.7}$

##Which number has a $7$ with a value of $\maroonD{0.7}$ ?  Hundreds | Tens | Ones | $.$ | $\maroonD{\text{Tenths}}$ | Hundredths | Thousandths :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  |  | $8$ | $.$ | $4$ | $5$ | $\greenE{7}$  |  | $\purpleD{7}$ | $.$ | $9$ | $9$ |   |  | $0$ | $.$ | $\maroonD{7}$ | $3$ |  $6$ | $\goldE{7}$ | $6$ | $.$ | $9$ |  |   The value of the $7$ in the number $0.\maroonD{7}3$ is $\maroonD{7\text{ tenths}}$ or $\maroonD{0.7}$.
The value of the $7$ in the number $0.\maroonD{7}3$ is $10$ times the value of the $7$ in the number $0.9\blueD{7}5$.

question.content: **In which number does the digit $6$ have a value that is $10$ times as great as the digit $6$ in the number $62{,}045$?**

hints.content: ##What is the value of the $6$ in $\blueD{6}2{,}045$ ?  $\blueD{\text{Ten thousands}}$ | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones :-:|:-:|:-: | :-: | :-:  $\blueD{6}$ | $2$ | $0$ | $4$ | $5$   The value of the $6$ in $\blueD{6}2{,}045$ is $\blueD{6\text{ ten thousands}}$ or $\blueD{60{,}000}$.

##What is $10$ times as great as $6$ ten thousands?  A digit in a place value column to the *left* is $10$ times as much as the same digit to the *right*.  Hundred thousands | Ten thousands | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones :-:|:-:|:-: | :-:  | $6$ | $0$ | $0$ | $0$ | $0$  | $\leftarrow$  $6$ | $0$ | $0$ | $0$ | $0$ | $0$   $10 \times 60{,}000 = \maroonD{600{,}000}$

##Which number has a $6$ with a value of $\maroonD{600{,}000}$ ?  $\maroonD{\text{Hundred thousands}}$ | Ten thousands | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | $5$ | $\goldE{6}$ | $8$ | $0$ | $8$ $\maroonD{6}$ | $4$ | $0$ | $4$ | $8$ | $8$ $8$ | $1$ | $4$ | $\greenE{6}$ | $9$ | $4$  | $2$ | $8$ | $3$ | $\purpleD{6}$ | $7$  The value of the $6$ in the number $\maroonD{6}40{,}488$ is $\maroonD{6\text{ hundred thousands}}$ or $\maroonD{600{,}000}$.
The value of the $6$ in the number $\maroonD{6}40{,}488$ is $10$ times the value of the $6$ in the number $\blueD{6}2{,}045$.
